item.title: EJBs in a WAR - Simplified packaging defined by EJB 3.1, Available in GlassFish v3
item.description: The EJB 3.1 specification says: An enterprise bean class with a component-defining annotation defines an enterprise bean component when packaged within the WEB-INF/classes directory or in a .jar file within WEB-INF/lib. In simple English it means, an EJB can...

item.title: TOTD #61: How to locally manage/monitor your Rails/Merb applications on JRuby/GlassFish using JMX ?
item.description: GlassFish Gem can easily run both Rails and Merb application. Using JRuby, as opposed to MRI, allows you to use standard Java monitoring framework and tools. Java Management Extensions (JMX) is a standard management and monitoring solution for Java...
